external_games.name: Witch's Heart: Shirarezaru Kako Majo Dorothy no Himitsu - Kanketsu-hen

name: Witch's Heart: Shirarezaru Kako Majo Dorothy no Himitsu - Kanketsu-hen
storyline:
After another failed loop, you forgot everybody else's memories and chose Sirius Gibson for your final story. This time, he's the protagonist.

At last, the story reaches an ending.
summary:
After "Witch's Heart: Bonus Stage", it is the third entry of the series by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment). This time, it focuses on one of the main protagonists and his conclusion: Sirius Gibson. It is an adventure game with horror themes made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, and contains simple action scenes.

Although published as a separate game, it is part of the main game.

videos.name: Game Intro
videos.title: 『Witch's Heart 知られざる過去 魔女ドロシーの秘密  -完結編-』 OPムービー
